snippet: In Newtown, Conn., the suffering is made raw again as the anniversary of the shooting nears.
abstract: Editorial notes residents of Newtown, Conn, are dreading the upcoming heavy news coverage as the one-year anniversary of the mass shooting there nears; says town is discovering what all scenes of American mass gun tragedy ultimately learn, namely that the suffering lingers long and even compounds within communities yearning for recovery.
lead_paragraph: In Newtown, Conn., the suffering is made raw again as the anniversary of the shooting nears.
